# <a name="add-a-birthday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="950c1-102">在 Outlook.com 中添加生日日历</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-102">Add a birthday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="950c1-103">在页面底部, 选择 "日历" 图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="950c1-104">[转到 "日历](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="950c1-105">在左侧窗格中, 右键单击 "**生日**" 并选择 "**新生日**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-105">In the left pane, right-click **Birthdays** and select **New birthday**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="950c1-106">输入人员的姓名和出生日期, 然后选择 "**创建**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-106">Enter the person's name and birth date, and select **Create**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="950c1-107">选择 "**生日**日历" 以打开和关闭提醒功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-107">Select the **Birthday** calendar to toggle reminders on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="950c1-108">了解有关[添加或删除生日和假日日历](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)的详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="950c1-108">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
